physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral painful gynaecomastia; scarcity of facial, chest, and pubic hair; reduced muscle bulk; small—almost impalpable—testes; no abdominal organomegaly.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially reported reduced libido, relationship problems, continuous dull testicular ache, and gradual reduction in size of testes. Improved potency and libido noted with depot testosterone treatment in July 2008.
